overview_of_class: This course provides a survey of the fundamentals of marketing within an innovative customer-value framework. We evaluate major trends and forces impacting marketing in the era of customer value and high-tech customer relationships: customer engagement marketing; a deep focus on brands; integrated marketing principles; and marketing accountability/measuring and managing return. Students will develop an understanding of how marketing is defined, marketing strategy (including segmentation, targeting and positioning), the macro-marketing environment, customer insights, consumer behavior, building customer value with brands, the four Ps (product, pricing, place and promotion), and the increasing importance of social responsibility.
name: Principles of Marketing
subject: MKTG
